about.title: About me
about.description: Curious by nature, I like to touch everything. I am particularly passionate about visual arts and web technologies. Every aspect of creating an app is important. I can help you to develop your products and intervene as much on back-end issues as front-end.

freelance.title: Freelance Full-Stack Web Developer
description: Development of a delivery mobile app for android using React Native.
Web scraping and data processing on sports competitions using Node.js and Puppeteer.js.
Automation of a launch campaign for a contest using Google Apps Scripts and Google Cloud Platform.

internship.title: Full-Stack Web Developer Intership
internship.subtitle: Flowbow, Paris, France
description: Creation of a showcase website and an administration backoffice with the stack MongoDb, Express, Angular and Node.js according to the Kanban method.
Wireframing, writing of technical specifications and tests set.
Deploying on a Debian VPS with Nginx and writing a handover documentation.
